dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazhydromet has put out a warning for several cities, including Almaty, for tomorrow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazhydromet has put out a warning for several cities, including Almaty, for tomorrow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet has issued a warning for residents of Almaty and other cities in various regions of the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, for April 11th—unfavorable meteorological conditions, they're calling it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, for April eleventh-unfavorable meteorological conditions, they're calling it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 11, 2025, unfavorable meteorological conditions for air pollution are expected in the cities of Karaganda, Ust-Kamenogorsk, and Almaty, the statement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, which is basically this perfect storm of calm winds, light breeze, maybe some fog… all that stuff that just traps pollution close to the ground.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, which is basically this perfect storm of calm winds, light breeze, maybe some fog... all that stuff that just traps pollution close to the ground.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unfavorable meteorological conditions refer to a combination of short-term weather factors (calm winds, light breeze, fog, temperature inversion) that contribute to the accumulation of harmful (polluting) substances in the lower layers of the atmosphere.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, so it's not like a storm warning, it's an air quality alert. That's sneaky.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, so it's not like a storm warning, it's an air quality alert. That's sneaky.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And it're hitting Karaganda, Ust-Kamenogorsk, and Almaty specifically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And it're hitting Karaganda, Ust-Kamenogorsk, and Almaty specifically.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 11, 2025, unfavorable meteorological conditions for air pollution are expected in the cities of Karaganda, Ust-Kamenogorsk, and Almaty, the statement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So what's the actual forecast for Almaty tomorrow, like, weather-wise?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So what's the actual forecast for Almaty tomorrow, like, weather-wise?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Partly cloudy, no rain, southwesterly wind around 3 to 8 meters per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Partly cloudy, no rain, southwesterly wind around three to eight meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 11, Almaty will experience partly cloudy skies with no precipitation. Wind: Southwesterly at 3"8 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So not totally calm, but light enough to let things settle. And the temp?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So not totally calm, but light enough to let things settle. And the temp?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Nights around 10 to 12, daytime up to 21, 23 degrees. Pretty mild, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nights around ten to twelve, daytime up to twenty one, twenty three degrees. Pretty mild, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But that inversion layer's gonna keep all the car exhaust and whatever just hanging there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But that inversion layer's gonna keep all the car exhaust and whatever just hanging there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unfavorable meteorological conditions refer to a combination of short-term weather factors (calm winds, light breeze, fog, temperature inversion) that contribute to the accumulation of harmful (polluting) substances in the lower layers of the atmosphere.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, not a great day for a long run outside, especially for sensitive groups.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, not a great day for a long run outside, especially for sensitive groups.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder if schools or anything will put out advisories. You know, keep kids indoors during recess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I wonder if schools or anything will put out advisories. You know, keep kids indoors during recess.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They might, especially with an official warning like this. Kazhydromet doesn't do these often.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Well, guess I'm working from home with the windows closed tomorrow.
